name: Yeehaw: A unity Project
description:
Controls:

A- Left

D-Right

Hold S to Crouch

Space to Jump

This was a class project for CSC 475.

All assets with the exception fo the comics in the cutscenes and the UI, were procured online.

All 3d Game assets were taken from the asset pac linked below:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/purple-crystal-mine-113576

We also used progrids to put together the level assets.

All sounds and music were licensed via Soundstripe and Soundsnap.

The music in the trailer was procured on youtube

Link: 

The development team included:

Programmer & QA: Anna Gallagher 

Artist: Lara Johnson 

UI & Programmer: Colby Kolpec

Programmer, Sound etc: Paul-Hugo Dlugy-Hegwer
